oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Abernathy, Patsey, 1903 October 29
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Patsey Abernathy, dated April 16, 1892. Illustrates the first page of the document. Abernathy’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on October 29th, 1903. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abernathy family
